targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "memory_power",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.hostname) AS name
FROM idrac9.totalmemorypower
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = idrac9.totalmemorypower.nodeid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  idrac9.totalmemorypower.nodeid IN ($Nocona)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "power_consumption",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.hostname) AS name
FROM idrac9.systempowerconsumption
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = idrac9.systempowerconsumption.nodeid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  idrac9.systempowerconsumption.nodeid IN ($Nocona)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "cpu_power",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.hostname) AS name
FROM idrac9.totalcpupower
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = idrac9.totalcpupower.nodeid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  idrac9.totalcpupower.nodeid IN ($Nocona)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "CPU1_Temp",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.hostname) AS name
FROM idrac9.temperaturereading
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = idrac9.temperaturereading.nodeid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  idrac9.temperaturereading.nodeid IN ($Nocona) AND
  fqdd = 'iDRAC.Embedded.1#CPU1Temp'
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "CPU2_Temp",

FROM idrac9.temperaturereading

WHERE

  fqdd = 'iDRAC.Embedded.1#CPU2Temp'
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "NIC_Temp",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.hostname) AS name
FROM idrac9.temperaturereading
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = idrac9.temperaturereading.nodeid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  idrac9.temperaturereading.nodeid IN ($Nocona) AND
  fqdd = 'NIC.Embedded.1-1-1'
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  avg(value) AS "Fan 1",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.hostname) AS name
FROM idrac9.rpmreading
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = idrac9.rpmreading.nodeid
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  idrac9.rpmreading.nodeid IN ($Nocona) AND
  fqdd = 'Fan.Embedded.1A'
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time
SELECT DISTINCT unnest(nodes)as node FROM slurm.jobs WHERE user_id IN ($UsersNocona) AND partition = 'nocona' AND start_time < ${__to:date:seconds} AND end_time > ${__from:date:seconds}

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(a.timestamp,$__interval), a.name, a.jobs, a.cpus from ( 
                SELECT  timestamp, CONCAT(nodes.hostname) AS name, jobs, cpus, nodes.hostname AS source_ip
                FROM slurm.node_jobs a 
                INNER JOIN nodes
                ON nodes.nodeid = a.nodeid
                WHERE $__timeFilter(a.timestamp)
) AS a WHERE a.source_ip IN ($NodeByUser) GROUP BY a.timestamp, a.name, a.jobs, a.cpus ORDER BY a.timestamp

SELECT
  *
FROM
  slurm.jobs
WHERE
  user_id IN ($UsersNocona)
  AND partition = 'nocona'
  AND start_time < ${__to:date:seconds}
  AND end_time > ${__from:date:seconds}
